Trade/Device Name(s): Tosoh ST AIA-PACK HbA1c Calibrator Set
Tosoh ST AIA-PACK HbA1c Control Set
Tosoh ST AIA-PACK HbA1c Pretreatment Solution
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Tosoh ST AIA-PACK HbA1c assay, calibrator, control set, and pretreatment solution for quantitative measurement of HbA1c in EDTA whole blood using enzyme immunoassay on Tosoh AIA System Analyzer
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative measurement of percent concentration of Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) in EDTA whole blood using the Tosoh AIA System Analyzer, aiding in management and treatment of diabetes; calibrator set for assay calibration, control set for quality control, and pretreatment solution for sample preparation.
